name: The Infiltration
description:
The Infiltration

'The Infiltration is an exciting game that tests your basic platformer skills and ability to memorise. During your mission, you enter a broken server in which you must infiltrate by entering  the code. Watch closely and be careful. Time is running out...'

                    -==========-

Key Features

Double jump to boost your way over firewalls, bugs and onto platforms to escape obstacles to advance to the next server.

-Be quick and careful as the timed platforms fall pushes your game experience to the next level, testing your reflexes and wits.

-The only way is to escape, avoid and evade these small nasties. Time your jumps well and just maybe, you'll advance to the next server.

-Collect the key to unlock to portal to advance further and closer towards your escape. Make sure to get each and every one of them.

-Soon the final challenge will put you to the test as the timer starts to run out...

                    -==========-

Controls

-A to move left 

-D to move right 

-Space to jump / press space twice to double jump

                  -==========-
